I've come up with a double the "The Pinch Hitter" as shown below.  I'd love to trade it for another one that I don't have that is in similar condition.  Drop me a note at [url]old-baseball@neo.rr.com[/url] if you've got some other T202's to trade.

Thanks!  

Kevin
